notesStmt.note: With a half-title printed perpendicular on the verso of A1: Burroughs Gospel-Revelation.
Signatures are continuous despite pagination including the final 9 leaves which are an advertisement.

The leaves between pages 171 and 201 are the contents of the Excellency of the soul and a half-title, similar to that mentioned above, on the recto of the leaf preceeding page 201: Mr. Burroughs on the beatitudes.
